pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Inspector | Code Execution Monitoring ToolInspector is a Code Execution Monitoring tool to help developers find out technical problems in their application automatically, before customers do.## Requirements- Python >= 3.x## InstallInstall the latest version of the package from PyPI:```shellpip install inspector-python```## Get a new Ingestion KeyYou need an Ingestion Key to create an instance of the Inspector class. You can obtain a key creating a new project in your [Inspector dashboard](https://app.inspector.dev).## InitializationHere's a code example of how Inspector is normally initialized in a Python script:```pythonfrom inspector import Configuration, Inspectorconfig = Configuration('xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx')inspector = Inspector(config)inspector.start_transaction('my python script')```## Official documentationCheckout our [official documentation](https://docs.inspector.dev/guides/python) for more detailed tutorial.## LicenseThis library is licensed under the [MIT](LICENSE) license.
